attributes.action: Nationalise Carehomes And Create a Carehome Residents & Workers Protection Act .
attributes.additional_details: Because we are all going to be old one day do we really want this situation to arise again and this fate to await us all . It is an absolute disgrace that people lose their homes to pay for their Care then do not even get transferred to a hospital after contributing all their lives to the system. No one is arguing their case & they cannot speak for themselves so it is our collective responsibility and duty to ensure this never happens again and that we learn the lessons from it.
attributes.background: Introduce Carehome Resident & Workers Act, mandatory routine testing of Care Home Residents & Workers & Provide Full PPE. Transfer Patients to Hospital for Ventilation. Introduce NHS Infection Control Managers into Care Homes, Nationalise Care Homes into the NHS by a 5% Billionaire Wealth Tax.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to clearly call on the UK Parliament or Government to take a specific action that they are responsible for. 

Whether someone needs to be ventilated is a clinical decision, not a decision for the UK Government or Parliament. Your petition asks for a few other actions. 

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312960
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302610

You could also start a new petition clearly asking for the UK Government to nationalise care homes and bring them all into the NHS, if that's what you'd like to happen.
